code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // explicit configure that we want to use spark-rest component     restConfiguration().component("spark-rest").     rest("/spark/hello").get().to("direct:hello").     rest("/spark/bye").get().to("direct:bye").post().to("mock:update").     from("direct:hello").transform().constant("Hello World").     from("direct:bye").transform().constant("Bye World"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             // explicit configure that we want to use spark-rest component             restConfiguration().component("spark-rest").             rest("/spark/hello").get().to("direct:hello").             rest("/spark/bye").get().to("direct:bye").post().to("mock:update").             from("direct:hello").transform().constant("Hello World").             from("direct:bye").transform().constant("Bye World").         }     }. }
